game.title: The Lost Temple of the Ancients
game.objective: Explore the lost temple and retrieve a powerful artifact.
game.description: A long-abandoned temple has been rediscovered deep in the jungle, and rumors speak of a powerful relic hidden within its walls. Brave adventurers are needed to explore the temple, overcome deadly traps, and claim the treasure before it falls into the wrong hands.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a magical amulet granting resistance to poison

task.objective: Navigate through the jungle and find the entrance to the lost temple.
task.description: The temple is said to be hidden behind a waterfall. Be careful of the steep cliffs and raging river as you make your way there.
task.location: Jungle Ruins, near the ancient stone bridge

task.objective: Disable the deadly traps protecting the temple entrance.
task.description: Use your skills and gadgets to disable the poisonous darts and spinning blades blocking your path.
task.location: Temple Entrance, just beyond the stone doors

task.objective: Raid the treasure chamber and retrieve the artifact.
task.description: Avoid the treacherous puzzles and guardians as you make your way deeper into the temple. Claim the relic before it's too late!
task.location: Treasure Chamber, at the heart of the lost temple
